thread.title: Rob Kardashian, Kris Jenner 'praying' for Lamar Odom
thread.title_full: Rob Kardashian, Kris Jenner 'praying' for Lamar Odom - NY Daily News

author: NEW YORK DAILY NEWS
title: Rob Kardashian, Kris Jenner 'praying' for Lamar Odom
text:
robkardashian via Instagram 'Praying nonstop for my Brother !!' Rob Kardashian posts support for his brother-in-law Lamar Odom on Instagram on October 14, 2015. Rob Kardashian is pulling for his pal.
The 28-year-old uploaded a touching image on Instagram late Wednesday throwing his arms around his estranged brother-in-law Lamar Odom as the former NBA star remains in a coma.
"Praying nonstop for my Brother !!" Rob captioned the very emotional shot.
KIM KARDASHIAN CANCELS BABY SHOWER IN WAKE OF LAMAR ODOM HOSPITALIZATION
Noel Vasquez/Getty Images Rob Kardashian (L) and Lamar Odom celebrate at the 2011 BBVA NBA All-Star Celebrity Game at the Los Angeles Convention Center on February 18, 2011 in Los Angeles, Calif.
The youngest Kardashian starred in Odom and big sister Khloe Kardashian's E! reality show "Khloe & Lamar" in 2012 before the couple split up.
Rob has since shied away from the spotlight of his famous family and is rarely seen in public.
Odom, 35, was found unresponsive at a Nevada brothel Tuesday after alleged drug use.
He was immediately rushed to the hospital and Khloe, his estranged wife, is currently at his bedside.
ODOM 'BECAME IRATE' BY 'KUWTK' EPISODE ABOUT FRIEND'S DEATH
"They were worried about his kidneys," a source at the hospital told the Daily News Wednesday on Odom's condition.
"They were failing today, but they gave him dialysis. His doctors think he could be OK," the source said with caution. "He is still critical, in ICU. So, anything can happen."
View Gallery The life and career of Lamar Odom
Rob wasn't the one to publicly share his support for Odom.
Momager Kris Jenner, who is currently with her daughter at the medical facility, also took to Instagram Wednesday and asked for prayers from fans.
"Please pray for Lamar #ourfighter," she captioned a picture of Odom in a Los Angeles Lakers uniform.
